page.title: 04Keyham Trust-Funds
page.content:
{The Keyham Educational Foundation}is a trust-fund consisting of sums of money bequeathed to the village at various times over 100 years ago. The fund exists to help young people living in the village with any aspect of their education. A sum of about Â£75 per year may be given to a student at University to help buy books; Â£40 could be given to a child to help finance a school trip to France, and so on.
{Keyham Relief in Need}is another trust-fund set up to help people facing financial hardship. Old people in the village are given a grant to help pay electricity bills.
